function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive association of between-ness centrality with the spread of COVID-19 in cities under study, widely distributed in China.","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 in cities with higher between-ness centrality.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted control measures at railway stations with higher between-ness centrality.","Technologies":"Targeted control and monitoring systems at railway stations.","People":"Residents, travelers, and commuters in cities with higher between-ness centrality.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, transportation agencies."},{"Description":"Negative impacts of between-ness centrality on the spread of COVID-19 in southwestern China and the Yangtze River delta.","Impact":"Potential for reduced spread of COVID-19 in areas with negative impacts of between-ness centrality.","Mitigation":"Enhance existing control measures in areas with negative impacts of between-ness centrality.","Technologies":"Improved surveillance and monitoring systems, public health interventions.","People":"Residents, travelers, and commuters in affected areas.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Positive association between the percentage of aging population and the spread of COVID-19 in certain cities in China.","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 in cities with higher percentage of aging population.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted education and awareness campaigns for younger people.","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns, community engagement programs.","People":"Younger and older population in cities with higher percentage of aging population.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, community organizations."}]}
